title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Quality Assessment Training for Print Educational Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and experience with print media utilization
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Using a checklist-based evaluation tool, 37 essential instructional design principles in printed educational materials are identified with 85% or greater accuracy
Inter-rater reliability (ICC) of 0.7 or higher is achieved with peer evaluators while conducting standardized evaluation protocols
A three-tier rating scale (Present/Partially Present/Absent) is applied to objectively diagnose material quality
Three or more improvement strategies for printed educational materials are proposed based on evaluation results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
